name: 顧客關係管理
description: The purpose of customer relationship management (CRM) is to establish long-term relationships with customers with a customer-centric and profit-oriented thinking. A good interactive mechanism between a firm and its customers relies on the in-depth knowledge about every single individual customer. In this class, necessary techniques and tools for CRM, customer evaluation metrics, relationship marketing theory will be covered. Database marketing will be emphasized. Some important data mining tools will also be introduced students.
syllabus:
本課程目的在於教導如何建立基於顧客為主及獲利導向的長期顧客關係.

每週教學主題如下

1.  Introduction (09/20)
2.  Overview of Customer Relationships Management (09/27)
3.  CRM, Database Marketing and Customer Value (10/4)
4.  Implementing the CRM Strategy (10/18)
5.  Introduction to Customer-based Marketing Metric (10/25)
6.  Customer Value Metric – Concepts and Practices (11/1)
7.  Mid-term (11/8, no class meeting)
8.  CRM Articles Presentation (11/22)
9.  CRM Articles Presentation (11/29)
10.  Designing Loyalty Programs (12/6)
11.  Effectiveness of Loyalty Programs (12/13)
12.  Term project presentation (1/3)
13.  Final exam (1/10, no class meeting)
